description: This made me a Christan and I met Jesus. We had a nice chat -he offered me Hummus. Thanks.

I installed it to have a look. Unfortunately for me, though it looks like a good app, all the bible texts are German except the Greek New Testament. I am new to linux so maybe there is a way of adding other language versions of the Bible, but I could not find any information about this on the help page.
summary: Not ready to recommend this app, unless you speak German
